summary: A young man and his wife struggle within the confines of their passionless relationship while he has an extramarital romance.
cast: Chikage Awashima|Ryô Ikebe|Teiji Takahashi|Keiko Kishi|Chishû Ryû|Sô Yamamura|Takako Fujino|Masami Taura|Haruko Sugimura|Kumeko Urabe|Kuniko Miyake|Eijirô Tôno|Kôji Mitsui|Daisuke Katô|Fujio Suga|Haruo Tanaka|Chieko Nakakita|Kazuko Yamamoto|Tatsuo Nagai|Keijirô Morozumi|Nobuo Nakamura|Seiji Miyaguchi|Teruko Nagaoka|Junji Masuda|Kôichi Yamada|Tsûsai Sugawara|Zen Murase|Nobu Kawaguchi|Hiroko Sugita|Norikazu Takeda|Toshio Shimamura|Jun Tanizaki|Tomoka Hasebe|Isao Matsunaga|Yûji Nangô|Tsuneko Sasaki|Yôko Chimura|Yasushi Sahara|Zenichi Inagawa|Shôsuke Oni|Kentarô Imai|Hideo Matsuno|Hisako Mine|Yasuyuki Suzuki|Takako Kanô|Masahiko Inoue|Akira Chiba|Tami Yamamoto|Chieko Ôta|Atsuji Nakayama
title: Primavera precoz
